 * </p>

 *   You DO NOT need to implement this interface in order to use it.
 * </p>
 * <p>
 *   Below is an example usage:
 *   <pre>
 *     {@code
 *             testTable().set()
 *             .id(23545494583L)
 *             .appRating(75.5D)
 *             .competitorAppRating(BigDecimal.ONE)
 *             .deleted(true)

 * </p>

    @FSColumn("_id")

    @FSColumn("app_rating")

    @FSColumn("created")

    @FSColumn("modified")
